title: Thunbird for Android  sent
creator: Matěj
content:
I don't have the same messages in the sent folder for Thunbird Android and for PC even though I have IMAP settings

Clarification: I send an email from Thunderbird Android, it appears in the sent folder both on PC and Android. I send an email in Thunderbird PC, it appears in the sent item only on PC, not on Android
metadata: ;useragent:Mozilla/5.0 (Linux; Android 10; K) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/135.0.0.0 Mobile Safari/537.36

title: Settings
creator: kite005
content: Is there a setting in Thunderbird to automatically download Gmail emails to Thunderbird instead of having to swipe to get them to populate.
metadata: ;useragent:Mozilla/5.0 (Linux; Android 10; K) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) SamsungBrowser/28.0 Chrome/130.0.0.0 Mobile Safari/537.36;os:Android

title: Thunderbird on Android missing message replies (gmail)
creator: tom.shell
content:
Folks, my inbox views do not show replies to messages. I use Gmail. When i look in All Mail, I see all the replies in a conversation view. In the inbox, however, I only see the messages from the initial sender.

What gives?

title: Android Thunderbird does not show sub folders anymore
creator: mail820
content: Please bring back the feature to show sub folders. Since my last update the sub folders are not supported anymore. It is a very important feature.

title: Tagging
creator: ichbindannmalwegmann
content:
Hi,

Is - and if how is - it possible to tag a message in Thunderbird Android.

Best,

Roger
